pr_title: Validate required related fields in custom actions

timeline.message: Fix(Field Processing): Commonize field processing components
Fix(Custom Function Actions): Add related field validation to custom function actions
Fix(CustomActions): Include required related field validation in custom actions

timeline.bodyText: This function is the primary change, most of the other changes are related to updating autowired constructor params.
timeline.author: gkillough

timeline.bodyText: This file contains some secondary changes. It is primarily making more methods public and updating the return types instead of modifying input parameters.
timeline.author: gkillough

timeline.message: Fix(ConfigField): Replace applyRequiredRelatedField in endpoint select

timeline.bodyText: I think you want to use Java's Predicate and not this Predicate object.
timeline.author: psantos1113

replies.bodyText: Wow, good catch. Why is this even a suggestion from Intellij haha?
replies.author: gkillough

timeline.message: Fix(CustomFunctionAction): Get all possible config fields for field model context to account for distribution jobs having multiple descriptors
Fix(Config Fields): Add logic to prevent collisions of ConfigFields in validation
Fix(Field Validation): Ensure all job models are available for extracting related fields during validation
